name: Pirates of the Sea
description:
Lost on an island in the middle of the ocean, after a shipwreck you'll have to find a way to get off the island. It sounds easy but it's not... you'll have to survive!

You will have to fight with the skeletons that chase you or even run away from them, collect all the items you can find, build a camp fire and cook some food. This will help you not starve! Build a hut because you will be staying on this island for a wile!

- Pick up and collect items
- Build a Hunt
- Look for treasures
- Loot your enemies in online mode
- Buy and sell items
- Fight anything that gets in your way
